channel.title: Delta Improvement
channel.description:
Hi, I'm James and most of you already know me :) I'm currently working with a Delta base (Delta X by Jeff from R-S) and I am going to rewrite a lot of the content inside it to make it both more stable, and more functional (modifying a skill slightly will be very easy, and will be easy to apply to every aspect of the skill).
I know that some of you will most likely have your doubts about this project - rest assured, I have them myself. I know that a Delta server will not compete in stability against Hyperion. It could, however, compete in content. I will be ripping out most of the content, and then re-writing it better.
[code]Changelog: 19/08/2012 - - Cleaned up a lot of the classes. - Removed fletching by Jeff. 20/08/2012 - - Made it possible to change the exp rate compared to RuneScape across the whole server with the change of a single number. - Began to rewrite fletching. 21/08/2012 - All longbows (logs to magic, not including Ogre) and all shortbows (logs to magic) now fletchable with level requirements. Not stringable. - Animations added correctly to fletching. They are in time with the fletching event.[/code]
[center]I know that I have to add media, I'll add a video in the morning, but it's 1:22am and I need some sleep :P[/center]

Then use Hyperion OoOoOoO.[/quote]

more boring

First Delta I’ve seen in a long time

Also, glad to see your back Ranger.
[/quote]
You haven’t seen F2p2006?
Also good luck Ranger. I hope you’ll bring this far.[/quote]
F2p2006 is amazing. <3333

mod Blake and the new devs like pk, and air x and such better be speeding up development.

item.title: Delta Improvement
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

[quote=“enzo42, post:13, topic:455210”][quote author=ranger squad link=topic=558112.msg4083169#msg4083169 date=1345541365]

http://www.runerebels.com/stresstester/

Post results :o You can do a before and after.

It’s on my crappy laptop and I haven’t done much on the side of stability but okay, I’ll try Gimme a few minutes.
[hr]
Tried to send 500 bots with an interval of 400ms, 500 connected eventually (ate my computer though XD, my client wouldn’t open.) but with a total of 83 dropped clients (the 500th bot to connect was agfstress583).

I re-ran the stress-tester with an interval of 800ms between connections, and the results were a lot more promising. The 500th bot to connect was agfstress509, only 9 connections dropped.
[/quote]

Whats the cycle time[/quote]

400ms between connection first, and then 800ms after.

And thanks Travas

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Improvement
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

ranger squad:

[quote author=kingman002 link=topic=558112.msg4082881#msg4082881 date=1345513811]It’s sad that Jagex went from a measly (at most) 50mb cache (I think that’s 474?) to a 300mb + cache.

Yep. Infact, I think 474 may have been smaller.

[quote author=lostmyphat link=topic=558112.msg4082878#msg4082878 date=1345513725]

[quote author=ranger squad link=topic=558112.msg4082877#msg4082877 date=1345513698]

Good luck What ever happened to the 718 server?
[/quote]I saw the 300MB cache download and decided not to download it

Add new networking! I never succeeded in that
[/quote]What you mean?

like netty

Hmm I’ll look into it[/quote]
NIO, netty is overused and NIO seems to be better overall

Read full topic

item.title: Delta Improvement
item.dc:creator: @ranger_squad ranger squad
item.description:
@ranger_squad wrote:

Hi, I’m James and most of you already know me
I’m currently working with a Delta base (Delta X by Jeff from R-S) and I am going to rewrite a lot of the content inside it to make it both more stable, and more functional (modifying a skill slightly will be very easy, and will be easy to apply to every aspect of the skill).

I know that some of you will most likely have your doubts about this project - rest assured, I have them myself. I know that a Delta server will not compete in stability against Hyperion. It could, however, compete in content. I will be ripping out most of the content, and then re-writing it better.

[code]Changelog:
19/08/2012 -

  • Cleaned up a lot of the classes.
  • Removed fletching by Jeff.
    20/08/2012 -
  • Made it possible to change the exp rate compared to RuneScape across the whole server with the change of a single number.
  • Began to rewrite fletching.
    21/08/2012
  • All longbows (logs to magic, not including Ogre) and all shortbows (logs to magic) now fletchable with level requirements. Not stringable.
  • Animations added correctly to fletching. They are in time with the fletching event.[/code]

[center]I know that I have to add media, I’ll add a video in the morning, but it’s 1:22am and I need some sleep :P[/center]
